name: News Flash-
description: This application is aimed at providing the user with the latest news from multiple sources, ability to save the articles of interest to read at a later time, have breaking news delivered via email every 12 hrs, and to provide 10 different inspirational quotes everyday to keep you motivated and inspired.
technologies: React, CSS Grid, SASS, Passport, Express, Sequelize/MySQL,Node.js, NodeMailer

name: Google Books Search-
description: This application allows the user to query Google Books API and display/save books based on user searches
technologies: HTML,CSS, React JS, Express,Mongo DB, Mongoose, Node.js, Google Books API

name: Coding Quiz-
description: This application is a timer-based quiz application that stores high scores client-side

name: Day Planner-
description: This is a calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of the day.

name: Weather Dashboard-
description: This application has the search functionality to find current weather conditions and forecast the weather outlook for 5-days for multiple cities.

name: Note Taker-
description: This application is used to write,save and delete user notes. This app uses an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

name: Rendezvous-
description: This application allows users to someone can find like minded people with common interests
technologies: HTML, CSS,JS,Node.js, Express, Express-session, Socket.io, Materialize, Bootstrap, Sequelize/MySQL,bcryptjs, Passport, Google Maps API.
